settings.text:
Use the source clone tool to clone these elements to make your own theme.
If you wish to submit a theme, feel free to do so in the pull requests under the
Github repository so other people can use your theme if they wish to do so.

This is a very basic template, if you wish to have an "All in one" solution,
use the browser source and use the link "/premade/stream" to
have the legacy version of the interface :)

If NO elements show here, make sure the link to the webserver
is correct by checking the .json file
